channel.title: Setup on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Setting up the individual modules
item.description: Setup Setting up the individual modules The Connector 365 Mail Experience Plus app combines the 3 apps from our Mail Plus series into one power app. Below we will tell you how to set up each area. Mail Subject Plus area The Mail Subject Plus area is for adding your own dynamic subject lines per report or customer to your emails. You can use placeholders to define your own content.
